#summary View Menu

=View Menu=

The following commands are available from the View menu:

  * Show Two Input Windows?

The rest of the View menu differs depending on which skin you're using. The default skin has the following options:

  * Show World Toolbar?
  * Show Spawns Toolbar?
  * Show Status Bar?
  * Spawns...
  * Show Toolbar Labels?
  * Debug Packets
